title: SIP Calling account cannot be used " SIM No Signal"
content:
Just posting a workaround that doesn't involve restarting the phone. Currently it appears that SIM Accounts as default is broken in Android 10, unless you have a perfectly unwavering network connection.

WORKAROUND:
Select a SIM based calling account as Default, save, then Switch back.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
